column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

There was a small yarding of trade and export cattle at Powranna on Tuesday with a better selection of yearlings that attracted stronger competition. The best yearling steers made 220c to 248c and heifers 230c to 252c/kg.
The few bullocks made 244c to 249c while the heavy cows sold for 192c to 198c and the seconds 156c to 172c/kg liveweight.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
